class.description: @brief The input data asset for the KdsCharacter module. This class holds all the input actions and settings for the KdsCharacter. It includes various input actions such as movement, looking around, sprinting, walking, crouching, jumping, aiming, and switching view modes. It also includes settings for mouse sensitivity and look rates.
@brief The base actor component class for all items in the KdsCharacter module. This class is used to define the basic properties and functionality(like equipping to the character) of items.
@brief The base player controller class for the KDS project.
